references.paper_title: Activized Learning: Transforming Passive to Active with Improved Label Complexity
references.reason: This paper provides an algorithm that improves the label complexity of active learning, a central focus of the current work.

references.paper_title: The True Sample Complexity of Active Learning
references.reason: This paper addresses the sample complexity of active learning, a key theoretical question related to the current work's focus on learning rates.
This foundational paper introduces the framework of universal learning rates, which is directly adopted and extended in this work.

references.paper_title: A Bound on the Label Complexity of Agnostic Active Learning
references.reason: This paper establishes a fundamental bound on the label complexity of active learning, a core concept relevant to the current work's analysis of learning rates.

references.paper_title: A Theory of PAC Learnability of Partial Concept Classes
references.reason: This paper introduces the theory of PAC learnability for partial concept classes, which is directly relevant to the current work's results on partial concept classes.
